member.name: ID3D11Device4.RegisterDeviceRemovedEvent
member.summary: Registers the "device removed" event and indicates when a Direct3D device has become removed for any reason, using an asynchronous notification mechanism.
member.param: The handle to the "device removed" event.
A pointer to information about the "device removed" event, which can be used in to unregister the event.

member.name: ID3D11Device4.UnregisterDeviceRemoved
member.param: Information about the "device removed" event, retrieved during a successful call.
